ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 432
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is your problem, mino horns are wind instruments. I got my skill maxed with a brass horn, standing in the Shady Swashbuckler s cave (way near the
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 23
> Date: Wed, 13 Oct 1999 10:36:25 -0500
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
> Subject: I can't Screech
>
>
> I'm Crier Sharpsong, a 26th half-elf Bard on Fennin Ro.
>
> I've been having a recurring problem getting my Brass skill up and would
> like to ask people here about it. I've read time and again that I should
> venture to Arena or a PvP area, start Denon's Disruptive Discord and leave
> it running indefinitely to increase my skill. However, I have not been
> successful in getting that to work. Initially I went to Arena in Rathe Mts.
> and tried this. I had read that you only needed to be in the area, not
> actually in the PvP area itself, so I equipped my Minotaur Horn,

There is your problem, mino horns are wind instruments. I got my skill
maxed with a brass horn, standing in the Shady Swashbuckler's cave (way
near the back). Started it up, and work up 10 hours later to maxed brass
skill.
